participant_1.background: i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. i grew up in the industry. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks.

participant_2.background: i am deathly afraid of heights. i am a party animal. my favorite movie is mean girls. i own a cat and a dog.

content.text: [Game Show Music Plays] And thank you, Mr. Announcer.
Hi! how are you doing? are you going to the big party on the hill?
The Apple Picking Festival is a go but Great Adventure only wants three nights instead of 1 0.
There's going to be a big party on the hill. I love to party but I'm not sure if I should go there. It is on the edge of the hill, and I am deadly afraid of heights!
CHEERING AND APPLAUSE I would, you know, coach you through a whole bunch of song selections, out of your comfort zone. So...
you mean I should stay at home and listen to the music you recommend? alone? that's no party at all! even together with my dog and cat
Mr. Shuster, I want to do more of an upbeat, glamorous song with a really good dance beat.
are you even listening to me? is music all you want to talk about?
III need music and dancing and secondhand smoke.
yup, so let's go to the party if you're not afraid of heights! you could cheer me up there
Good. 'Cause I'm looking for dancers who can dance for 15 seconds 'cause that's how long my song is.
that's a very short song. and dance
Uh, I... I just said that this song is... is so great. I love it.
whatever. where's your song. let me hear it
(BOTH SINGING) You believe in rock 'n' roll?
hahaha isn't it dead?
So I... I thought since it's your song...
that should be enough I suppose...
So I... I thought since it's your song...
yup
DANCE MUSIC THUMPS Weirdest place you've ever done it.
